alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 11:26PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Montgomery, San Jacinto, northwestern Liberty, southwestern Polk and southeastern Walker Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1126 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shepherd, or 13 miles north of Cleveland, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Shepherd, Coldspring, Goodrich, North Cleveland, Lake Livingston State Park, West Livingston, Romayor and Evergreen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto; Walker
